survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction and effectiveness of the current workplace wellness programs to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current workplace wellness programs offered by your employer?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current workplace wellness programs offered by your employer?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which wellness programs do you currently participate in? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture participation across different programs.

script.question_text: Which wellness programs do you currently participate in? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace wellness programs?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace wellness programs?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in workplace wellness activities?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected any wellness program in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure engagement levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Show only if Q2 has at least one selection other than 'None of the above'.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in workplace wellness activities?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected any wellness program in Q2.
